excerpt: "BNPL is essentially a modern take on in-store layaway, and has seen a huge surge in popularity in recent times, with adoption rates climbing at an impressive rate. As the name suggests, BNPL services offer shoppers a fast and flexible way to purchase items they might otherwise have been unable to immediately afford."
